input_args.passage: 'Mark E. Mitchell - Wikipedia | He received the award in 2003 for his actions during the Battle of Qala-i-Jangi, which took place in late November to early December 2001. Milwaukee, Wisconsin, U.S., Battle of Qala-i-Jangi'
input_args.claim: "Source then provides the crucial information that this battle took place following the intervention by United States-led coalition forces to overthrow the Taliban's Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan, and that it was this organisation that had been harboring al-Qaeda operatives."
